title: In theory a 100% health Kled would be impossible to kill in a single rotation
body:

replies.body: That's the whole point of this Skaarl mechanic. It's his defense mechanism.  He is a skirmisher, this means he will build a lot of damage. So he needs a way to stay alive a bit longer. Just like Master Yi gets Meditate and Alpha Strike.

yeah, but one has it as a **PASSIVE** while other has ability Meditate and Alpha Strike which is broken ability since beta.


It's quite funny how new champions get everything on silver platter, while others are in the mud.

i mean when he does use it heloses access to e entire ability. and his q changes to a . . . arguably more damaging ability. he cant run away like at all. its a passive that shits on him if you dont win the fight quickly

Because Riot is better at implementing ideas now. More or less. 

Or it just seems that way because it was a successful experiment.

1 rotation =/= 1-shot.

With infi AP, Veigar could Q to make Kled dismout and then R to kill him.  That's easily within the bounds of a "rotation."

Lifesteal is useless vs hit & run team comps...

I've generally been sending him top but I've found an early lifesteal item is still good for recovering health by clearing waves, regardless of the comp one is up against. Death's Dance in particular is super good on him because the reverse-bleed-tick synergies really well with a melee feller who has to absorb punishment in order to deal it out, and who is pretty much gridlocked to building defensive items on the side.

Kled only has a base hp5 modifier of 6 at lv1 and is hugely AA focused so not taking advantage of that easy sustain can be a real crux.

> [{quoted}](name=Derpyon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qo1piAvQ,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2016-08-12T08:09:55.005+0000)
>
> But in an actual common game scenario with all these different variables,could he achieve said status?

I've had 90 minute games in the past so with really low chances, yes he could.
He has a high base HP because Kled and Skarl have both their own separate HP and Kled's mechanic is all about managing mounted vs dismounted state. Dismounted Kled has just 2 abilities available.

> Dismounted Kled has just 2 abilities available.

And a passive increasing his attack range and movement speed when moving towards enemy. And if managed well he can have his mount every few minion kills giving him huge ass free shield.

Why the downvotes the guy is right, while it IS weaker overall, the additional ms and attack range make is easier to last-hit and the dismounted Q push back means that Kled can combo it to hit a champion with his Vicious Tendencies and land a lot of the Q bullets (each gives Kled a good portion of Courage) while ALSO putting him at a safe distance often ending in Kled mounting Skarl in about two rotations of this.

That's something that can be adjusted if needed be, including their base HP. They are two own separate units to the game so it stands to reason that together they have high base HP but when you drop them bellow, you get just Kled that is unable to run away but can run you down.

That's the whole point of their thematic. Skaarl is good at running away while Kled never runs away.

This makes me think of an interesting question.. If Kled has just been dismounted, do things like Veigar's ult, which scale with missing HP, to dmg to him based on Skaarl's missing HP as well? Basically, does the lack of Skaarl actually count as missing health or not.
i don't think so, there's two separate numbers on Kled's health bar, his and Skaarl's. They both act independently.
That was my assumption as well. I'll have to test it when I get the IP for Kled or he's on free rotation.

Well i mean there are two physically separate numbers, so the health reads like 740/740 (meaning kled) 740/740 (meaning skaarl) [these are just example numbers]. the two numbers do not affect each other at all.
Reminds me of gnar before they nerfed him.
most of his base hp is skaarl though, so once he dismounts he's incredibly mediocre, I think his damage needs tuned down, but his defensive stats seem fine to me

Not every single champion is supposed to be killed in a single rotation. The whole point of tanking is to soak up the upfront burst damage in a fight, survive, and go for the backline/peel for the squishies. Just about every meta tank can survive a Veig rotation if they itemize properly.
Kill the Lizard, then Kill the Yordle.

I once toyed with the idea of maybe having a portion of True Damage also affect Kled himself even while he's mounted to Skaarl, but that might have just been me as a Vel'Koz main annoyed that his was the one face I could not melt.

Another neat thing about Kled,

GA is actually REALLY weak on him compared to other bruiser/fighters.  Since Skaarl gets all the bonus health and DOESN'T return with GA, the item is quite weak.
